name: Gardevoir ex
author: Masahiko Ishii

poke_power.name: Imprison
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Gardevoir ex is your Active Pokémon, you may put an Imprison marker on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. Any Pokémon that has any Imprison markers on it can’t use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies. This power can’t be used if Gardevoir ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.effect: You may move a {R} Energy card attached to Gardevoir ex to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
